channel.title: [Turbo] Let's Grand Idea again! - Bastard NK Survivor (Solic) Wins!
channel.description:
# Let's Grand Idea again! forum.imperium42.com/t/grand-idea-fol-ashes-version/69876
- days 15 mins, expect twilight to be 2 mins, nights 5 mins and expect aurora to take more 5 minutes as well - early day actions are usually processed during the day, late day actions are twilight material because of the host's speed - setup will only start if more than 50% of the players of the players are from good factions - town will be a NB faction since they didn't clear the contradiction on the wincon yet to decide if it is NB or scum - there can be two kings or madness alike, but elections will only ocourr when there are no kings - there is a lot of info to compute so the first twilight post (after I announce "this is hammer") is a strike and the second one is a modkill - squire passive counts as an immunity now - I'm in a laptop so have mercy - seeking for a co-host to do VCs, announce how much time there is remaining and type down non-BD night actions - hjasik classes will only be rolled if there are wincon changers or converters
0. co-host plox 1. marluxion 2. luxy 3. meteoro 4. blizer 5. icibalus 6. solic 7. poisonedsquid 8. priestess 9. bluestorm [till infinite]
@PoisonedSquid @DatBird @BlueStorm @eevee @eevee @Solic @margaret @reaper @meteoro
only canning this when I'll go out for more than 1h (dinner, sleep or church) and I'm in a sunday morning so plents of time

item.title: [Turbo] Let's Grand Idea again! - Bastard NK Survivor (Solic) Wins!
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
that’s fine
but twilight posting isn’t nearly as bad as night posting and shouldn’t be punished as such, even if you’re caluclating day actions

If people keep talking after the flip and the day OFFICIALLY ends, that’s where it becomes a problem

Read full topic
item.source: [Turbo] Let's Grand Idea again! - Bastard NK Survivor (Solic) Wins!

item.title: [Turbo] Let's Grand Idea again! - Bastard NK Survivor (Solic) Wins!
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Solic:

/vote Firekitten

Solic:

You did something to me, didn’t you.

back-to-Firekitten:

Go back to the grave where you belong

back-to-Firekitten:

You might as well vote yourself here solic

back-to-Firekitten:

you were actually a bastard fool who didn’t know they were fool

how tf did you just lose that

back-to-Firekitten:

Don’t even want to play the game? Sad times

I’m glad my first instinct is at least to distrust Firekitten.

Read full topic
